content: the crochet pattern comes with 5 sizes as well as instructions on how to easily adjust blanket to any size if you re here just looking for the baby size that pattern listing is available separately the sand & sea blanket is a great baby blanket for a beginner crocheter or any skill level it s relaxing just like the sand & sea and exactly what most of us need from time to time finished sizes * baby - 31 5 x 34 5 * toddler - 42 x 52 * lapghan - 40 x 44 * throw - 48 x 55 * large throw/queen - 80 x 85 yarn used caron cotton cakes #4 worsted weight in beachglass * baby 17 oz /1060 yds * toddler - 38 oz/2348 yds * lapghan - 31 oz/1905 yds * throw - 46 oz/2830 yds * lg throw/queen - 120 oz/7369 yds hook size i/9 5 50 mm skill level this is a beginner level pattern with easy to follow instructions you will need to be familiar with basic crochet stitches all patterns are in english and written in standard us terms
